list.title: EventHandler.addEventListener
list.description: Begins to listen for the given event to call the method later.

list.title: EventHandler.fireEvent
list.description: Fires the event given to call the methods linked to that event.

list.title: Friend
list.description: Contains data of a single friend

list.title: Player
list.description: Contains data of a single player

list.title: addEventListener
list.description: Adds a listener to {@linkcode EventHandler} to call the method.

list.title: banPlayerByID
list.description: Defaults to banning the player with the given ID.

list.title: bonkAPI.receivePacket
list.description: Makes your client receive the given packet.

list.title: bonkAPI.sendPacket
list.description: Sends the given packet to bonk servers.

list.title: chat
list.description: Sends message in game's public chat.

list.title: event:chatIn
list.description: When the user has received a message.

list.title: event:gameInputs
list.description: When inputs are received from other players.

list.title: event:gameInputs
list.description: When inputs are received from other players.

list.title: event:gameStart
list.description: When game has started

list.title: event:gameStart
list.description: When game has started

list.title: event:hostChange
list.description: When the host changes.

list.title: event:hostChange
list.description: When the host changes.

list.title: event:joinRoom
list.description: When the user joins a lobby.

list.title: event:mapSwitch
list.description: When the map has changed.

list.title: event:mapSwitch
list.description: When the map has changed.

list.title: event:modeChange
list.description: When the mode has changed.

list.title: event:modeChange
list.description: When the mode has changed.

list.title: event:modeChange
list.description: When the mode has changed.

list.title: event:modeChange
list.description: When the mode has changed.

list.title: event:pingUpdate
list.description: When the user receives ping update.

list.title: event:receivedFriend
list.description: When the the user has been friended.

list.title: event:roomJoin
list.description: When inputs are received from other players.

list.title: event:teamChange
list.description: When a player has changed teams.

list.title: event:userJoin
list.description: When another player joins the lobby.

list.title: event:userLeave
list.description: When another player leaves the lobby.

list.title: event:userLeave
list.description: When another player leaves the lobby.

list.title: getHostID
list.description: Returns the player ID of the host.

list.title: getMyID
list.description: Returns your own player ID.

list.title: getOnlineFriendList
list.description: Gets all online friends.

list.title: getPlayer
list.description: Returns the {@linkcode Player} object of the ID or name given.

list.title: getPlayerByID
list.description: Returns the {@linkcode Player} object of the ID given.

list.title: getPlayerByName
list.description: Returns the {@linkcode Player} object of the name given.

list.title: getPlayerIDByName
list.description: Returns the user ID of the player with the given name.

list.title: getPlayerList
list.description: Returns the entire list of {@linkcode Player} objects that have joinedsince you have.

list.title: getPlayerListLength
list.description: Returns the amount of players that have been in the lobby.

list.title: getPlayerLobbyList
list.description: Returns list of {@linkcode Player} objects in the lobby at time thisfunction was called.

list.title: getPlayerNameByID
list.description: Returns the name of the player of the ID given.

list.title: getPlayersByTeam
list.description: Returns a list of {@linkcode Player} objects that are in the specifiedteam.

list.title: getPlayersInLobbyID
list.description: Returns list of user IDs in the lobby at time thisfunction was called.

list.title: isInGame
list.description: Returns whether the game is running afteryou have first joined a lobby.

list.title: receive_ChatMessage
list.description: Triggered when received a message.

list.title: receive_FriendReq
list.description: Triggered when the user receives a friend request.

list.description: Triggered when the game starts.

list.title: receive_HostLeave
list.description: Triggered when the host has left.

list.title: receive_Inputs
list.description: Triggered when a player sends an input.

list.title: receive_MapSwitch
list.description: Triggered when map has changed.

list.title: receive_ModeChange
list.description: Triggered when the mode changes.

list.title: receive_NewHost
list.description: Triggered when there is a new host.

list.title: receive_PingUpdate
list.description: Triggered when recieving ping updates.

list.title: receive_PlayerJoin
list.description: Triggered when a player joins the lobby.

list.title: receive_PlayerLeave
list.description: Triggered when a player leaves the lobby.

list.title: receive_RoomJoin
list.description: Triggered when the user joins a lobby.

list.title: receive_TeamChange
list.description: Triggered when a player changes team.

list.title: receive_gameState
list.description: Data given by host after join.

list.title: receive_gameState
list.description: Triggers after joining a room and the game state is sent.

list.title: safeToCap
list.description: Returns whether the capzone can be cappedwithout ending game or desyncing

list.title: send_GameStart
list.description: Called when started the game.
